LanguageData.OE_Module_Shock.label: Psychic Module - Shock
LanguageData.OE_Module_Shock.description: The module provides the owner with power of Psychic shock lance. Unique designed on the basis of Archotech technologies.
LanguageData.OE_Module_Insanity.label: Psychic Module - Insanity
LanguageData.OE_Module_Insanity.description: The module provides the owner with power of Psychic insanity lance. Unique designed on the basis of Archotech technologies.
LanguageData.OE_Module_PowerBeam.label: Targeter Module - Power beam
LanguageData.OE_Module_PowerBeam.description: The module provides the owner acess to orbital power beam targeter. Unique designed on ancient targeting unit for a network satellites.
LanguageData.OE_Module_Bombardment.label: Targeter Module - Orbital bombardment
LanguageData.OE_Module_Bombardment.description: The module provides the owner acess to orbital bombardment targeter. Unique designed on ancient targeting unit for a network satellites.
LanguageData.OE_Module_Tornado.label: Targeter Module - Tornado generator
LanguageData.OE_Module_Tornado.verbs.Verb_Spawn.label: Targeter Module - Tornado generator
LanguageData.OE_Module_Tornado.description: The module provides the owner acess to orbital of weather-control satellites. Unique designed on ancient targeting unit for a network satellites.
LanguageData.OE_Module_Camouflage.label: Special Module - Camouflage
LanguageData.OE_Module_Camouflage.description: The module provides the owner camouflage. Unique designed to resemble the environment.
LanguageData.OE_Module_Privateer.label: Special Module - Privateer
LanguageData.OE_Module_Privateer.description: The module provides the owner integrated grappling hook. Unique designed to getting in and out of dangerous situations easily. Grappling hook connects to walls and solid rock and allows the users to quickly move to the desired location.
LanguageData.OE_Module_Pacifier.label: Psychic Module - Pacifier
LanguageData.OE_Module_Pacifier.description: The module provides the owner with power of Psychic pacifier. Unique designed on the basis of Archotech technologies.
LanguageData.OE_Module_AnimalTamer.label: Psychic Module - Animal Tamer
LanguageData.OE_Module_AnimalTamer.description: The module provides the owner with power of Psychic animal tamer. Unique designed on the basis of Archotech technologies.
LanguageData.OE_Module_PlantGrower.label: Psychic Module - Cornucopia
LanguageData.OE_Module_PlantGrower.description: The module provides the owner with power of Psychic cornucopia. Unique designed on the basis of Archotech technologies.
